duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate a variety of heavy equipment used in excavation and site construction.
Follow company safety procedures and bring problems to the attention of management.
Perform routine inspections and preventive maintenance on equipment, referring defects or needed repairs to the supervisor.
Possess knowledge of moisture condition, cut grade, and ability to load trucks.
Possess knowledge of cutting and filling grade and GPS.
Seeking operators specializing in one or more specific equipment.
Pass a drug test and criminal background check, and multi-task in a fast-paced environment.
